entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level 2000 metres rising to 2300 metres near noon. Local amount 5 mm. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
